arweave.name: arns-record-lookup
arweave.description: Minecraft-themed ARNS record lookup interface with wallet integration and JSON viewer. Lookup ARNS names and interact with AO processes.

arweave.name: botega-liquidity-pool-info
arweave.description: Comprehensive liquidity pool interface with price operations, token management, and real-time data display. Connect to Botega liquidity pools and manage trading operations.

arweave.name: staking-panel
arweave.description: Retro-style staking interface with real-time message logging. Stake, unstake, and finalize operations with AO process integration and ArConnect wallet support.

arweave.name: bazaar-nft-portfolio
arweave.description: Comprehensive NFT portfolio explorer with 3D carousel, profile management, and asset discovery. Search by wallet address or profile ID with retro pixel art styling.

props.title: Arweave Bazaar

props.description: Create, update, and manage your decentralized identity on the Arweave permaweb. Build your profile, showcase assets, and connect with the decentralized community.

arweave.name: arweave-nft

arweave.description: A message signing component for AO/Arweave wallets.

arweave.name: ao-token-demo
arweave.description: Comprehensive AO Token management interface with transfer, grant, mint operations, balance checking, and real-time activity logging. Connect to AO token processes and manage token operations with ArConnect wallet support.

arweave.name: chatroom-on-chain
arweave.description: Real-time on-chain chatroom with emoji picker and quick messages. Builder-friendly and fully self-contained.

arweave.description: Minecraft-themed ARNS record lookup interface with wallet integration and JSON viewer. Lookup ARNS names and interact with AO processes.

arweave.name: botega-liquidity-pool-info
arweave.description: Comprehensive liquidity pool interface with price operations, token management, and real-time data display. Connect to Botega liquidity pools and manage trading operations.

arweave.name: staking-panel
arweave.description: Retro-style staking interface with real-time message logging. Stake, unstake, and finalize operations with AO process integration and ArConnect wallet support.

arweave.name: bazaar-nft-portfolio
arweave.description: Comprehensive NFT portfolio explorer with 3D carousel, profile management, and asset discovery. Search by wallet address or profile ID with retro pixel art styling.

arweave.name: ao-token
arweave.description: Comprehensive AO Token management interface with transfer, mint, grant operations, balance checking, and process health monitoring. Full integration with ao-js-sdk for token operations.

landing.name: web3-landing-page

props.heroSubtitle: Build exceptional decentralized applications with our comprehensive Web3 component library. Secure, scalable, and beautifully designed for the blockchain era.
props.aboutDescription: ArDacity revolutionizes blockchain development with a comprehensive suite of battle-tested components. Our library combines cutting-edge security with elegant design, enabling developers to create stunning decentralized applications faster than ever before.
props.featuresSubtitle: Comprehensive tools and components designed specifically for Web3 development

features.title: Security Audited
features.description: Every component undergoes rigorous security audits to ensure your users' assets remain protected.

features.title: Gas Optimized
features.description: Intelligent optimization reduces transaction costs while maintaining peak performance.

features.title: Design System
features.description: Cohesive design language that scales beautifully across all your decentralized applications.

features.title: Multi-Chain Ready
features.description: Seamless integration across Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, and 17+ other networks.

features.title: Mobile First
features.description: Responsive components optimized for mobile wallets and cross-platform compatibility.

features.title: Developer Tools
features.description: Comprehensive CLI, testing suite, and debugging tools for streamlined development.

props.pricingSubtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your Web3 development journey

landing.description: Modern, customizable Web3 landing page with hero, about, features, and pricing sections.

landing.name: web3-landing-page-2

props.heroSubtitle: The ultimate component library for blockchain developers. Create beautiful, responsive, and secure decentralized applications with our comprehensive collection of Web3-ready components that seamlessly integrate with your dApps.
props.aboutDescription: ArDacity is the premier on-chain component library designed specifically for blockchain developers. We provide battle-tested, secure, and beautifully crafted components that seamlessly integrate with your decentralized applications, making Web3 development faster and more efficient than ever before.
props.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to build exceptional decentralized applications

features.title: Blockchain Native
features.description: Components built specifically for Web3 with native blockchain integration and smart contract compatibility.

features.title: Security First
features.description: Audited components with built-in security best practices to protect your users and their assets.

features.title: Lightning Fast
features.description: Optimized for performance with minimal gas costs and instant UI updates for the best user experience.

features.title: Customizable Design
features.description: Fully themeable components that adapt to your brand while maintaining Web3 functionality.

features.title: Multi-Chain Support
features.description: Works seamlessly across Ethereum, Polygon, BSC, and 12+ other popular blockchain networks.

features.title: Mobile Optimized
features.description: Responsive components that work perfectly on desktop, mobile, and Web3 wallet browsers.

props.pricingSubtitle: Flexible pricing for developers and teams building the future of Web3

landing.description: Modern, animated Web3 landing page with hero, about, features, and pricing sections.
